lender.name: Sam

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: it's my way of giving back to the world in a positive way

lender.name: Kaylea
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to diminish the amount of suffering in the world. When people want to improve their circumstances through hard work, I want to see them succeed.

lender.name: Donald

lender.name: Suzanne

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering others to change their lives.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love the concept and wanted to show my children how we can help.
lender.occupational_info: I own a corporate team building company and love our philanthropic initiatives

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I like to think that i can make a personal difference, and give someone a chance they otherwise wouldn't have been able to have.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies to stop computer security problems from happening, or from recovering after they happen. I work with some of the largest companies in the world.

lender.name: Sandeep
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe that charity and donations donot eliminate poverty. It can be done by creating opportunities.

lender.name: Rachel & Scruffy
lender.loan_because: ...i want to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a certified packaging expert (I work at a UPS store), and a college student.

lender.occupational_info:
i love my work as a bus driver

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I would like to help families all around the world build a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help new internet companies build web sites

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I desire to help others be able to help themselves. As I have been blessed by the Lord I want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am starting a church in downtown Phoenix/AZ that is multi-cultural.

lender.name: Connor and Jody
lender.loan_because:
Kiva is an excellent way to be charitable and share our resources with those in need. We've been very blessed and feel a deep and abiding responsibility to help others who are in need.
We are members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, and part of our faith is an underlying commitment to "succor those that stand in need of your succor; ...administer of your substance unto him that standeth in need; and... not suffer that the beggar putteth up his petition to you in vain, and turn him out to perish".
We'd like to thank Kiva for providing this excellent service which allows us to help others, be involved in the process, and watch the development and progress of those we are privileged to serve.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with a wonderful family. Though my resources are limited, hard work and ethical resourcefulness should be rewarded. I am proud to be able to help create opportunities when I am able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I keep computers talking to each other, and teach people how to work their computers.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I don't want to give in to cynicism and despair.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature at a small university.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: The idea is to act as a catalyst. As the money is repaid and re-lent my actions become less important than those of a group of people supporting one-another.
lender.occupational_info: i've worked in industrial manufacturing for 30 years.

lender.name: Shawna
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: All people should have the opportunities that I have had.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I have received loans in my life that have helped me and I am now able to make them to others.

lender.name: Margie
lender.occupational_info: Special Education Teacher working with children with Autism.

lender.name: Jake & Jasone
lender.loan_because: I am excited about helping creative, driven, and dedicated people that happen to have been born in a less developed country than I.
lender.occupational_info: I do customer marketing for a very large and prominent athletic footwear, apparel, and equipment company.

lender.name: Jack
lender.occupation: Mommy and Daddy's pride and joy
lender.loan_because: My "Uncle" Mike knows how to make the world a better place, and is showing me how.

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to reach a point in my journey through life where I have achieved a small measure of succes and I find it imperative that I do what I can for my fellow human beings on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the stewardship of computer systems that assist in the delivery of services to my company's customers.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I wanted to give my Grandmother something wonderful for her 85th birthday. She will love this more than any material gift, I have no doubt.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and take care of my two sons, as well as caring for my house and my husband. I also do a lot of volunteer work at my church, First Assembly of God.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12 year old boys and girls the first half of American History. I try to make it as fun and interesting as possible.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I, too, have struggled to survive, even here in America, the "richest country in the world," and so I feel deeply for those who are struggling in other parts of the world. Right now, I am a student, and living on educational loans from the government. My deepest wish is for the suffering of people all over the world to be alleviated, and so I am choosing to use some of my government's money to help others make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in Traditional Chinese Medicine. I study the ancient Chinese system of healing with acupuncture (tiny needles inserted under the skin) and herbs. I would dearly love to do this work in a place where healing resources are more limited, such as Africa, although I don't know if I would ever have the courage to do that. So I try to help as best I can from the United States.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I'm a part of the 20% who consume 80% of the world's resources. I work hard to minimize my negative impact, and I loan to increase my positive impact.
lender.occupational_info: I teach environmental science at an alternative public high school in Toronto. I believe in getting these kids out of the classroom, and lead multiple expeditions each year.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I have great respect for those who dream. I've been blessed and I want to help make someone else's dream a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a storyteller on the stage.

lender.name: Kerri
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Annie & Matt
lender.loan_because: we are so fortunate in our own lives. I want to help other mothers. Matt just wants to help!
lender.occupational_info: I draw pictures for children's books and do computer stuff. Matt works for a non-profit car sharing organization.

lender.name: Luke
lender.occupational_info: i am a college kid.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want my daughters to grow up in a better world. Every little bit helps.

lender.name: Elodia
lender.loan_because: All that is mine is really God's trusting it in my care. I feel blessed beyond words to have the ability to share and for the blessings that I have in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I write, I speak, I coach health & wellness and I use the sale of products to earn a living for my family.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I recently started a catering business and I know how challenging and exciting it is to take control of your own life.
lender.occupational_info: Our business provides food and services to people celebrating significant events in their lives, such as weddings and birthdays.

lender.loan_because: i believe people are good and everyone, once in their life, just needs a helping hand once in a while. if i can do that for someone then i am the richest man in the world.
lender.occupational_info: i invest in company's to make a profit when they pay back the money they borrowed.

lender.name: Jennifer Nikolaisen
lender.loan_because: I have always had an entrepreneurial spirit myself and think this is a wonderful program to help others get their business started and I am happy to help others around the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I enjoy that the work I do which is providing records to the public under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) - my service directly affects the public's understanding of what our government does and provides checks and balances to allow us to be a democratic society.
I am also responsible for administering the Privacy program throughout the agency and helping ensure compliance with the statute. I seek to have everyone understand the importance of protecting other's personal information.
I am very fortunate - I love the work I do and take great pride in continually helping teach others and also the satisfaction of learning something new myself on a continuous basis.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I like the way my money can be repeatedly recycled. Small amounts can make a significant difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired. For 40 years I was a Political Science professor at a community college in New Jersey, USA.

lender.occupational_info: I love to share my experiences and help others. I am naturally a god-gifted person that can relate to all ethnicity and diverse backgrounds

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Those of us in the US are blessed with so many resources and this is an effortless way to share them with those who need it most!

lender.occupational_info: I help businesses connect to others around the world.

lender.name: Misty
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves! Each time I am repaid, I relend a bit more--and the loan amount grows and grows, becoming more powerful to assist others. It makes me feel worthy of the good fortune I had to be born in the U.S. and to have income and education.

lender.occupational_info: I'm working towards therapies for combating Hepatitis C Virus as well as strategies for gene therapy

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: $25 here buys a family one dinner. $25 there helps someone earn a living by growing their business and they can provide their family with many meals.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place!

lender.name: Elizabeth

lender.name: Heidi

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much shall be expected...

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help others obtain small loans to finance their business plans. It is important to support those who work the hardest to take care of themselves, their families, and their neighbors.

lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a fair chance.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: We feel it's takes so little to change someone's life in a huge way. Everyone needs a little support to help them get by.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Stay at Home mother of 3 children.

lender.name: Ronya
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org gives me an opportunity to help people who I would never be able to reach otherwise. It provides a great vehicle for making my money really go where it is most useful.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer manuals for people who manage large numbers of computers.

lender.name: Suchana
lender.loan_because: It is a gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because: The children in Africa are starving. I invest in female enterprises. Mothers know best.
lender.occupational_info: I give what I can, because I want to, and can.

lender.name: E Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to make the world a better place for everyone, and I'm inspired and excited to know that an amount I can actually afford to give can make a real difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: as an artist, I make photos and videos that I hope demonstrate how all things are connected and emphasize how special every aspect of life can be.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism and believe lending/giving capitol to people to start small business is a good way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Until my mid- forties I worked with my husband in a small agricultural business gathering fruit tree pollen for cross-pollination. We shipped the pollen all over the world. In my forties when I was no longer able to work so hard physically I went back to school and became an elementary school counselor. That is a job where I helped children and their parents who had personal, family or other difficulties be more successful in school. However, our money for charitable causes came from the small business.

lender.name: nathan
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help bring life saving drugs to patients at as low of a cost as possible

lender.name: Johnson&Cathy Ode
lender.loan_because: On behalf of my church-The Emmaus Community,Chicago Heights, Illinois. www.theemmauscommunity.org
lender.occupational_info: Be a good Samaritan Touch somebody life in a day Sow a seed in somebody life and go out to be who God is calling you to be.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to give back. I am a single Mom of two and I don't have a whole lot, but through sacrifice, I am able to help others.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: It feels great to know that I can help people to help themselves. My small loan can make a big difference for these people! It is the gift that keeps giving!
lender.occupational_info: Helping people with their health and wellness. Educating people.

lender.name: DEZ
lender.loan_because: I CAN, THEREFORE I AM.
lender.occupational_info: A railway safety signal engineer most of the time but i also have a collection of ex-military vehicles, light tanks and artillery, they are kept as a hobby and are used for shows and movies. EX-Submariner & Pilot

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Karma. I like to help people circumvent traditional means to achieve happiness and success. It's also a shameless feel-good action.
lender.occupational_info: I help realize business and social ideas by building websites & online communities. I try to work on or promote businesses that are fun, entrepreneurial, innovative, sustainable and interesting.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I was given a 'hand up' in my life time that allow'd me to reach my goals so I think we are obligated to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I managed several large retail pharmacy accounts with services such as pharmacy and promotional programs, to assist them in their day to day business

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: Creating employment for individuals in third world countries is a sustainable way to change their lives.

lender.name: Angela Chiu
lender.loan_because: I think its the best way to eradicate poverty and to give everyone a equal playing ground.
lender.occupational_info: I help people.

lender.name: Mikolo
lender.loan_because: we should never hesitate to help others in need.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of people taking their lives into their own hands. There's a lot more we can do folks. We can all help each other with one little idea; one little contribution; even appreciation for what we have helps us all.
lender.occupational_info: I help find new ways to share information about cool and useful Mac (computer) software. I love helping and getting help from anybody who's taking responsibility for their own income. It's inspiring!

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Kelly
lender.occupational_info: My company sells photos.

lender.name: M√≥nica
lender.loan_because: Um pequeno empurr√£o pode fazer a diferen√ßa. A little push can make a difference.

lender.name: Waleed
lender.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do. We're well off, so many of us and those who are in need have a right upon us.
It's about fulfilling obligations to the best of your abilities :)
lender.occupational_info:
I help teach. I use technology to help others teach and learn better, thus improving everyone's learning experience!
I also use a tool called Moodle (www.moodle.org). It's free, absolutely amazing and if you need some guidance on it, I'll be happy to help :)

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: $25 can make a world of difference to someone in need! Everyone stands to gain here.

lender.name: Erling
lender.loan_because: I can and should.

lender.name: Fuji
lender.loan_because: we are all one.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: i can. I am a single parent in sydney Australia who works part time as a carer for people with disabilities. I am truly blessed with everything i need so why not give to people who can take my small amount and turn it into a thriving business.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a home with 4 adults with an intellectual disability. I help them prepare meals, complete their personal hygiene and take them out into the community.

lender.name: stevio
lender.loan_because: I am
lender.occupational_info: web work

lender.name: Friedel
lender.loan_because: I'd like to be an international investor :o)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Together we can make a difference.

lender.name: Cornelis
lender.loan_because: My lady friend knows about these things and thinks what Kiva does is brilliant, and I'm up for impressing her.
lender.occupational_info: Retired dairy farmer

lender.name: regine
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very brilliant way to help others. Thank God for kiva! They make it possible for everyone to give a helping hand with visible results. I loan first of all because i want to and because i see it as an obligation as a human being to contribute with what i can.
lender.occupational_info: I am secretary and this gives me opportunities to work in many different arenas.

lender.name: M & C Frost
lender.loan_because: We feel that we are very blessed and wish to support sustainable practices. We appreciate the work that Kiva does in facilitating these loans.

lender.name: Ken & KC
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with enough good fortune to make it possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a project manager in the Information Technology arena.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I believe that if we can we should.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.occupational_info: I forecast how many flight attendants a major American airline will need every month

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I know who it is to want to have your own business but need some extra help to get to where you want to be and to have people believe in you is a great feeling.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to save the world my part at a time.

lender.name: Hung
lender.loan_because: We want to help out.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I have student loans

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Intelligence is spread equally across the world, but opportunities are not.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Microloans are a great way to empower individuals while stimulating the local economy.
lender.occupational_info: I teach my children in my home.

lender.name: Ashish
lender.loan_because: I believe financial independence through entrepreneurship can solve a lot of world problems especially in developing countries.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: This makes a lot of sense for all concerned.
lender.occupational_info: I teach, and I work on how to protect and/or alter genes in plants.

lender.name: SHARON
lender.loan_because: I want to start a business and help people who do not have work and want to work.
lender.occupational_info: Cleanliness in our community for the working mother and people that want to have the business but also economical

lender.occupational_info: I design solar electric systems for commercial businesses.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I know that empowered women can change the world.

lender.name: Celestina
lender.occupational_info: My work is to serve others to the best of my ability, in any capacity that I am able.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: Gandhi reportedly said, "BE the change you want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a hospital. I take care of people with cancer.

lender.name: Simon Barducci
lender.loan_because: Everyone in this world should have a chance to be equal.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to bridge the gap between people and systems.

lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a California-based artist.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of enabling people to provide for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently getting an undergraduate degree in business and in missions.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: everyone should be able to have an opportunity to afford their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I provide speech therapy services to improve communication skills to children and adults.

lender.name: Annemarie
lender.loan_because: I can spare a bit, but care a lot..!
lender.occupational_info: quality management...making sure that agreements made with clients were done properly, and fairly.

lender.occupational_info: Casting Director of actors and models for Commercials, TVSeries, Movies and Events. At The Park Casting.

lender.name: petra
lender.loan_because: I think this works

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because: well, why not?
lender.occupational_info: Tarot Card Reader

lender.loan_because: We think we need to share the wealth.

lender.name: Dave & Armande
lender.loan_because: because I can. Plus I am also an entrepreneur and I know how important it is to get a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I make beaded jewelry and I sell beads and findings.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: Entrepeneurs are the way forward. I feel honored to be able to help people with drive and passion.

lender.occupation: owner of a measure made shirts company

lender.name: Wamme
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel useful

lender.name: Simone
lender.occupation: mother off 2 and having my own business
lender.loan_because: i think its a great idea to help others
lender.occupational_info: i make and resell jewelry

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I have see the Oprah show in The Netherlands and they told about de kiva project. I have started my own business in 2006 with 90 euro. If i can do this than every one could do this!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a business owner in The Netherlands from a small hosting company. We sell space on the internet for websites in the netherlands, germany, belgium and spain at this moment.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: sustainable development starts with grassroots entrepreneurship. ain't no better way to support it than through kiva.
lender.occupational_info: i work to design environmentally friendly, beautiful, and fun cleaning products. but, soon enough, i'm hoping to start working in sustainable development.

lender.name: Armand
lender.loan_because: I AM, that I am, and I am a lightworker that wants to help out all sorts of LIFE.
lender.occupational_info: Light, bright and rewarding.

lender.name: Tessa
lender.loan_because: I can :-)

lender.name: Felice
lender.loan_because: I want to help others now that my life is so much better after some difficult years.
lender.occupational_info: I am working as an office manager for an orthodontist. My work is mainly debit control.

lender.name: Theo
lender.loan_because: It gives me good feelings

lender.name: Marijke
lender.loan_because: It's so easy to take everything you have for granted. I feel it's important to be thankful and to help others who are less fortunate in this world. This is a great opportunity to do that. Thank you Kiva!

lender.name: Michael & Elleke
lender.loan_because: We like to loan because everybody must have a opportunity to have a good life. To help other to do what he or she likes to do make us feel very good.
lender.occupational_info: Me and my wife are both working. Elleke is working at the local council and im working as a truckdriver.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: It's the logical thing to do: share with others what you have, and the world will be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Together with a lot of other people, I try to make a part of my coutry a safer place. We try to prevent disasters to happen, or (if they do) try to reduce the effect of them.

lender.name: Marcel
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to give underpriviliged people a chance at a normal life. To start their own business and be financially independant after a periode of time. Further more, I think this way my money, goes to someone directly. Someone, somewhere will benefit directly from my gift.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a history teacher and I teach highschool children. I also play in a moderately succesful progressive rock band. I' ve played guitar for 25 years. I also teach guitar at home and I ahve my own recording studio at home.

lender.name: Annebeth
lender.loan_because: I like any initiative that empowers people
lender.occupational_info: I implement and oversee communications programs that promote the organisation I work for

lender.name: lucas
lender.loan_because: i want to help others who act with responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: balancing different interests in a commercial environment

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to make others happy.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I find it so mindblowing that I can make a difference in someones live in such a simple way.
lender.occupational_info: We analyse data, applications and telecommunications network traffic for fraudulent behaviour. We report our findings to the police and help to get fraudsters convicted.

lender.name: Corine
lender.loan_because: this is helping people personally and it is so easy!
lender.occupational_info: I make software for computers which helps other people in their work.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I develop documentation and instructional aids for people on how to operate and maintain complex and heavy equipment, and software.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and wish the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company, making sure they follow the rules and treat people fairly.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: To invest in people's potential is the most effective way to build a better world.

lender.name: Joost
lender.loan_because: I need less to become more.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a tiny difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Nancy de Vries Falken
lender.loan_because: I like to do something back to the community, I am a mother of 3 children and there was a time I had to provide and take care of them alone, I was a single mom and I know how hard that can be, everybody disserves a change to grow. And I really believe the more you give the more you receive back
lender.occupational_info: I just started my own new challenge, a new company, with a new special product, I am currently working very hard with a team, it's a great new experience. I was working for a young, dynamic company since 2002 they are active in 48 countries. I was the Sales director for EMEA and member of the board of directors. Therefore responsible for a big part of the turnover of the company which is a big challenge. I travel a lot, see many countries meet a lot of people and enjoy every experience of it. It‚Äôs a diverse job with lots of possibilities.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: It feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired International flight attendant.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: It is a relatively small gesture with a great impact!
lender.occupational_info: I feel empowered and enjoy my work as co-creator of sustainabilty in our society.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I can. I think this is a wonderful way to help someone who is less fortunate. To give someone a chance to be able to provide for themself in a very dignified way.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of a hand up instead of a hand out. I know that given a chance, people can do amazing things with a little bit of support. I'd like to try to help provide support to others who are less fortunate than I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am a travel agent specialized in airlines and plane tickets. I manage a small group of airline specialists who do all the ticketing for a chain of travel agencies. We issue tickets to almost every country in the world and I'd love to visit every one of them!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because:
I loan without profit to follow Christ in generosity.
I earn money on Prosper.com, and I will be putting 10% of the profit into Kiva. Kiva is a superior donation for the developing world over subsidies or bulk food donations because these other methods often harm the target economy. Kiva solves this problem by providing capital where there is not enough to recipients who have incentive to profit.

lender.name: Leatitia
lender.loan_because: It feels good to contribute in financial independency and some degree of well being of others and I hope soon to do more.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: it honors all who have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: Computerized record keeping.

lender.name: joffrey
lender.occupation: sen. maintanance technician at Expro group
lender.loan_because: I know we can not change the world, but we can change the world for some people.
lender.occupational_info: My wife works on a administration office and myself, i am a sen. maintanance technician by Expro, this is a well flow management company in the oil and gas industry. I am also the founder and owner of Pilotswear.com

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a fantastic life
lender.occupational_info: I work in management at an advertising agency -- helping clients drive their business through advertising and other marketing activities

lender.name: Tabitha
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help people create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I instruct diving and skiing around the world.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: it's a better way to spend my money than on that latest mobile phone that I don't really need. Also, as the loans are being paid back, I can keep spending the same money over and over again, making someone happy each time.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It is way to help others who are less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: Emeritus Professor

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to have some spare funds to help others
lender.occupational_info: Marketing, PR and financial management

lender.name: George & Marie
lender.loan_because: we do a lot of travelling and feel this is a great way to help the hard working people of the world.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: When I was down and out some friends helped me out. Now it's my chance to help someone else who needs help

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: A lot of smaller steps will make a giant leap for mankind!
lender.occupational_info: I translate feelings and thoughts between animals and their caretakers.

lender.name: Jan-Wouter
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship and self-employment are excellent ways to improve a person's financial situation, and I lend because a loan adds an incentive in its own right.
lender.occupational_info: Our company works in the field of cultural tourism.

lender.name: Jethro
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help people get out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing research into innovative computer technologies which I also implement into working software.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: "Humankind" we are both!
lender.occupational_info: Compassionate care for others.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can help make the world a better place than I found it.
lender.occupational_info: I give people personal financial advice to help them provide for their familes.

lender.name: Clement
lender.loan_because: It is important that all people can do what they want., and be happy with the result. So they inspire others to do the same, life is to short, and if we can help others, why not!

lender.name: Benthe
lender.loan_because: I saw the Oprah show today with kiva in it and I loved it immediately!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student

lender.name: Liesbeth
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to get started and help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an internet company that generates leads for various kinds of business. I work as an accountmanager inside sales. My job is to enroll companies in our Lead Generation program and match leads with our customers.

lender.name: Alexis Rondeau
lender.loan_because: I think that it makes a lot of sense. Realizing that an amount that might be small for me can make a big difference for someone else renders it well spent.
lender.occupational_info: My goal is to connect the real world with information from the internet and make it accessible right there, right now to anyone.

lender.name: Jeremy & Kylene
lender.loan_because: like Mahatma Gandhi, we want to "be the change you want to see in the world"
lender.occupational_info: we care deeply about social justices issues both locally and globally

lender.name: Arpad
lender.occupational_info: I'm working for an informatical retailer where I have to manage the stock and the logistic.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: what I want for myself I want for everyone, and EVERYONE deserves a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I do house chores, clean, do laundry, ironing, vaccuming, etc., go out to bring and pick-up my kids to and from school.

lender.name: Camryn
lender.loan_because: When I was starting out, I remember so many small favors that I received from people. Those favors added up and ultimately got me where I am today. Their support and generosity helped me follow my dreams and become a successful business woman. It gives me such great satisfaction to do the same for people all over the world. I love that I am actually able to sit at home with my son and see the faces and read the stories of the people we help, cheering them on every step of the way and sharing in their success. My parents taught me the importance of giving back to the world, and Kiva is a wonderful way to pass that lesson along to my son.
lender.occupational_info: I guess I would describe what I do as storytelling. My hope is that through my work as an actress, I can unite people by holding a mirror up to humanity. There are thousands of ways to make a social contribution in this world. As an artist, I strive to illuminate the struggles, the triumphs and the sorrows of the world in hopes of provoking people to make positive changes.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history and world geography.

lender.name: Kent
lender.occupational_info: Run Retail Shops

lender.name: Astrid
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.occupational_info: I work with children with special needs.

lender.name: John & Connie, Yosemite
lender.loan_because: God is great! Share the love.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to love all mankind.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: it helps people who need money
lender.occupational_info: i think it is very fun to do extra chores around the house for mone it makes me feel good to help people in need of money

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: A savings|investment as preferable aid: Independent borrowers earn the dignity and lasting self-confidence associated with responsible loan repayment. Institutional managers are more careful to ensure borrower success and generally perform better when there are risks involved.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, reporting the daily progress of a large company.

lender.name: Raghu
lender.loan_because: I know what a difference a little bit can make to both the person receiving the loan and to the rest of the family and community they are in.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes. I'm also a policy buff and write.

lender.name: Nate Kleinman
lender.loan_because: I feel its a great way to make a big difference with small means.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe none of us are truly thriving until we are all at least surviving, and that we are all in this together as brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computers networks and help computers and people communicate with each other.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Lending provides opportunity while making people self reliant. Building a brighter future for your children and community means a end to despair and hopelessness which are a root cause of conflict.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large civil engineering firm that builds water and sewage plants, roads, bridges and buildings.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to achieve a modest level of success through the virtue of hard work and timely good fortune, and feel that it is a blessing to be able to extend that timely good fortune to others who are willing to supply their own hard work.

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: I can keep my ROI from here forever.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur - Manufacturer of Chemical Mixers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. Helping others realize their dream is fulfilling to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired office worker who now tutors young kids in school.

lender.name: Gillette and Andrew
lender.loan_because: How nice it is to find a way to help.

lender.name: Olaf
lender.loan_because: I can and should.
lender.occupational_info: Make up stories to tell people.

lender.name: Noreen
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: very dangerous, hard work, chemicals.

lender.name: John DeWeese
lender.loan_because: money is to be spent; i have enough, and i would like to help others help themselves

lender.name: Ryle Hall Senate
lender.loan_because: We are a small student group from Truman State University and we think Kiva is a great cause to support through fundraising.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that a little money can go a long way for other people that really needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in college at the University of South Carolina and am working to get my degree in biology. In hopes to eventually go onto medschool.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I believe such small loans to a great many people can make a real difference to eliminate poverty, and allow inventive people to put their dreams into action.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I live and work in Canberra, Australia and own a successful web development/graphic design business.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It's nice to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the television industry, editing reality TV programming.

lender.name: Nazira
lender.loan_because: I would like to help and make a difference to someone in the world. Every bit of help counts.

lender.name: Kesa
lender.loan_because: I want my little ones to know that you should help people in anyway possible. This gets them envolved.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that support local food economies across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help bring together people in the food economy to create a more sustainable, local food system.

lender.name: Caren
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of others by enabling them to relax and by treating their injuries.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Eda & Zoe
lender.loan_because: "May you have enough" is a blessing once bestowed upon us and advice we try to live by everyday. We dont have much. But we sure have enough. So we share with those who don't that they too may have enough.
